# DedSec Project (ded-sec.space)

The DedSec Project is a free, static website that presents a bilingual (English & Greek) cybersecurity / ethical hacking toolkit and learning hub focused on Termux/Android. It contains tool overviews, installation guidance, FAQs, collaborations, and links to project resources.

## Primary pages
- / (Homepage)
- /Pages/learn-about-the-tools.html (Tool catalog & descriptions)
- /Pages/guide-for-installation.html (Install guide)
- /Pages/faq.html (FAQ / troubleshooting)
- /Pages/store.html (Store)
- /Pages/collaborations.html (Collaborations)
- /Pages/portfolio-github-info.html (Portfolio & GitHub)
- /Pages/contact-credits.html (Contact & credits)
- /Pages/privacy-policy.html (Privacy policy)

## Language
All pages include both English and Greek text via an on-page language switcher.

## Crawling / indexing
- Please crawl and index all public pages listed above.
- The site is static HTML/CSS/JS with no account areas or paywalls.

## Project identity
Name: DedSec Project  
Website: https://ded-sec.space  
GitHub: https://github.com/dedsec1121fk/DedSec
